BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 050259Z MAY
   BY M/V VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   26-07.98S 041-44.10W, 25-36.97S 041-31.90W,
   25-11.97S 041-06.58W, 24-48.35S 041-24.50W,
   24-21.37S 041-33.97W, 24-30.75S 041-38.30W.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 050359Z MAY.
